nodes.text: It is now time for the midterm exam. This might be the last exam you take in this class if you do not do well on it.
Following the test, you will have three days of break before classes resume. I will see you then... assuming you pass this test today.

It's Oktoberfest, and a crooked tax collector and the Lord Mayor are judging a beer tasting contest. You deftly borrow the Mayor's wife's prize pearls without her knowledge. Then as you shake the tax collector's hand, you place the pearls in the pocket with his handkerchief. When he takes out his handkerchief to wipe his mouth, the pearls fall to the floor in front of everyone, thereby raising the Mayor's suspicions that the Tax Collector is crooked. Are you a Thief or a Rogue?

A town is plagued by monsters. You offer to send word to a famous hero to save the town, but it won't come cheap. When they gather money for a reward, you steal it and ride away. Are you a Thief or a Rogue?
True or False: The Way of Godot is to hide in plain sight.
True or False: Most Rogues are arrogant, egocentric, and self-righteous.
True or False: The Way of the Küchenschabe is to slowly sneak around so as to not attract notice.
You come across a locked chest in the middle of the ruins of a haunted castle. What is the wisest thing you could do?

options.text: Get out a poison antidote in case the chest is trapped.
Make sure that there is no other threat in the area before you try to pick the lock.
Study the lock and hinges for traps.
Leave it alone because it is obviously a trap.

nodes.text: How does one find a hidden door?

options.text: Look for marks on the floor that indicate traffic or movement where there shouldn't be.
Observe the layout of the area and look for walls that don't quite match the others.
Tap on the walls to listen for hollow sections.

nodes.text: What does the Way of die Spinne suggest that you should carry with you on your exploration?
What is the major difference between Rogues and Thieves?

options.text: A Rogue has a sense of humor.
A Rogue uses his brains more than his skills.
A Rogue tries not to harm others.
Steal from the Rich and give to the Poor.
Unmask the hypocrisy and criminal actions of a crooked Politician.
Trick a wealthy man into paying his workers a living wage.
Set a Ghost to rest by fulfilling its last request.

nodes.message: Shawn's Midterm Score is ${ego.test3score} of a possible 100.

nodes.text: I have a sneaking feeling I didn't do so well on this test!
School Rules When you have to take a test You should always do your best But if you want to play the fool Then, alas, it's bye-bye school.
I don't think I did well on the test.
I think I did okay on the test.

nodes.name: Yay!
nodes.description: The midterm's over and no class for three days!
